title: Opinion: Why the Intel Core i9-9900K CPU could be too hot to handle
description: ![Intel 9th GenCPU]()We wanted to test Shadow of the Tomb Raider too, but it was so intensive thatit repeatedly caused the i9-9900K to crash. Once we’ve got the new cooler in,we’ll be sure to add Shadow of the Tomb Raider’s benchmark results.**Are you going to get the new Intel Core i9-9900K? Let us know@TrustedReviews on Twitter.**
